description:
Selfish, arrogant and strong-willed, she is the heiress of a particular plutocrat. She graduated from Ryouzuki school three years ago and is currently a student at a certain top notch university.
Masaru was a freshman while she was a senior when she became his girlfriend. But right before her graduation she suddenly broke up with him.
Source: VNDB
name: Saegusa Maki
